title: Progressive Overload: The Basics
excerpt: How to add weight or reps without stalling.
contentHtml: Progressive overload drives adaptation. Add small increments weekly and deload when fatigue accumulates.

title: 1RM Formulas: Epley vs Brzycki
excerpt: Which estimator makes sense for you.
contentHtml: Epley tends to fit high-rep sets. Brzycki fits lower-rep efforts. Track your own error and choose.
